author: ahinzmann
body:
Backport of #14723 and #15119.

This changes MiniAOD content, so unless we start a new MiniAOD campaign at some point, this does not go into the 80X release.

However, it would be nice if cmsbuild could test this, since we may distribute this as analysis recipe.
title: Backport of 81X PU jet ID
